attributes.action: Army train all prisoners and gangs in Britain and send them to the frontline in Afghanistan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Jobs for the youths with no future:
We pay too much tax to keep these criminals in prison. We are terrorised on our streets by gangs. Clean up the estates by removing all young people over 16 who have nothing else to do but bring terror to our streets. Take these terrorists who terrorise our streets, army train them and march them to the front line in Afghanistan to terrorise the Taliban.
